name: Saviour (Robonaut121)
description:
The world is being consumed by eternal darkness. But do not fear! Our halo-headed warrior of light will  guide us to a portal to a new, safe world, and defend us against the darkness! 

You must throw survivors across gaps they cannot climb themselves while trying not to overshoot into the abyss, and then watch them climb on air because my code was so bad :'-)

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- LMB to shoot at the darkness

- E to pick up and throw survivors across gaps.
